content: **knitted neck warmer with saddle shoulders in drops nepal the piece is worked top down with rib and stocking stitch sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ne-344 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl - xxl/xxxl **materials** drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-200-200 g colour 0612 medium brown **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm for rib needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
